data.title: Develop3d
data.body:
Vertex and Index Buffer Get Data implemented
RenderTargetBinding implicit operator implemented
Wireframe Rasterizer state
HalfVector HalfSingle added
ContentManager Implemented and Added
Other Minor Changes ...

data.title: develop - Testing enhancements and simplifications
data.body:
The Tests submodule now includes the ability to filter tests in the console test runner, as well as a simplification of the DrawString tests.

See [this commit](https://github.com/kungfubanana/MonoGame-Tests/commit/bb51fda9aa04e316b3056912a343053574e6c394) in MonoGame-Tests for more detail.

data.title: Develop3d - Fix SpriteFont character spacing - ported from develop fix
Develop3d - Fix up Tick from develop
data.body:
### Tick

Fix from develop

data.title: Fixes SpriteFont.Spacing handling
data.body: SpriteFont rendering (and measuring) was previously ignoring SpriteFont.Spacing.  The Spacing value is now respected.

data.title: Updates Samples and StarterKits subs
data.body: Samples and StarterKits have been updated with the dropped changes from the recent reorganization.

data.title: Links submodules to the reorganized Samples, StarterKits and Tests repos
data.body: And that's all I have to say about that.

data.title: Develop3d - Ports the sprite font modifications from develop branch also ...
data.body:
### SpriteFont
- This ports the sprite font modifications from develop branch
- Modified the Mac solution to use the common SpriteFont class instead of the Mac specific one.
- Checked all the other systems to make sure they are using the sprite batch and SpriteFont of the common code base in Graphics.
- Linux is still left the same.
### Tick Method
- This also adds Tick support to the Game class and am testing with the Mac platform.  
- If this does not cause problems and is stable then the other platforms will need to be changed to use the Tick

data.title: Android Changes
data.body:
Added new AndroidCompatibility class with ScaleImageToPowerOf2 (defaulted to true) and ESVersion (defaulted to 2.0). It automatically sets how XNA behaves by default.

Commented out where GL11.Viewport is set in SpriteBatch because it doesn't work. Screws up the resolution.

Added implementation of Tick.  Converted Android to use Tick.

Added SwapBuffers to Platform and AndroidGamePlatform.

data.title: TouchCollection.FindByID() has wrong return value type
data.body: In XNA, the return value of TouchCollection.FindById() is a bool. In MonoGame it is an int. MonoGame should be updated to match XNA.

data.title: Unbreaks Linux
data.body:
Removes Linux-specific files that are now provided in a platform-neutral way.  Gets Linux running a bit and passing some tests.

Probably some collateral damage here.

data.title: Unbreaks Linux
data.body:
Removes Linux-specific files that are now provided in a platform-neutral way.  Gets Linux running a bit and passing some tests.

Probably some collateral damage here.

data.title: Improves SpriteFont to conform more closely to XNA
data.body:
Also makes the core SpriteFont class platform-neutral and removes platform-specific implementations of SpriteFont.
### SpriteFont
- Reimplemented to measure text and draw it more closely to XNA's
  implementation.  There may still be subtleties to work out.
### SpriteBatch (all platforms)
- Updated to use SpriteFont.DrawInto rather than duplicating
  string-drawing functionality across the classes.
### Texture2D (Windows and Linux)
- Quick-and-dirty implementation of GetData<T> so visual tests can be
  performed.
### WindowsGameWindow
- Game.DoUpdate and Game.DoDraw are now both called from OnRenderFrame
  to improve compatibility with the visual tests.  Eventually this
  should be reworked when Game.Tick is implemented.

data.title: Develop
data.body:
Added new AndroidCompatibility class with DoCatchupUpdates and ScaleImageToPowerOf2.  It automatically sets how XNA behaves by default.  

Commented out where GL11.Viewport is set in SpriteBatch because it doesn't work.  Screws up the resolution.

Re-add precompiler directive so the default can be set to 1.1.

data.title: Add Reflect method implementation to Vector 3
Android (Probably other platforms too) Gesture Drag vs Tap
data.body: Tapping the screen triggers the drag event and release and then a moment later the OnSingleTapConfirmed is thrown.  I think this should be an either/or relationship.  Also, the drag event should have a minimum movement requirement before triggering so just tapping the screen doesn't drag.

data.title: Fixes Mac Synchronous Run Mode
data.body: Mac synchronous run mode now uses NSApplication.PostEvent rather than CGEvent to ensure that NSApplication.Stop takes immediate effect. This facilitated the removal of a bunch of gross P/Invoke code as well as providing perfect behavior.

data.title: Merge flighingdevelop Matrix class with MonoGame base.
Fix draw2d test
data.body:
This updates the Tests submodule to the commit that fixed the Draw2D
sample.  Previously the wrong icon was being used (scaled 2x).

data.title: Updates Tests for automated building
data.body:
- Testing libraries have been moved from ThirdParty/Libs into Tests/Libs.
- Test harness has been updated with new command line options and is now also available on Windows.
- Ifdef'd around a compile problem in XnaToOpenTK.cs which will need to be fixed properly at some point.

data.title: Unless OpenGL ES 1.1 only supports square textures, the power of two...
data.body: scaling in the constructor needs to scale each dimension.   If square textures are required, it needs a logical OR  in the while loop to scale to the largest dimension, so it is broken either way!

data.title: Refactored the Gesture code so all the Gesture detection is in the GestureListener
Gesture support on iOS was sending very wrong values. I got it working better for my purposes (landscape app with pinch/pan support), but could probably use further changes.
data.body: ...ta values). Tested in landscape mode on iOS.

data.title: Added _matrix multiply to spritebatch in opengl2.0 codepath
data.body:
Added this to make my calls to SpriteBatch that use the transform matrix to display in the right position (at least in portrait mode)

I added a static helper class to help with Xna Matrix to OpenTK matrix conversion.

data.title: Comment out resizing for textures over 1024 size
data.body:
Ok this keeps going back and forth.  Some people need it and some people do not.  Right now there are more people that do  not need it than do.  So it comes out again.

This is more from the cause of people using native graphic files and not xnb files.

Not sure of a way to get a common work around except to maybe tell people to make sure their files are in the correct format.

Fix a potential problem with OpenAL interface.  Windows is not done but will put in the fix for that later.

data.title: Android GameActivity and Texture2D fixes
data.body:
Fix for a crash in the AndroidGameActivity if the Window.Parent is null or not a FrameLayout
Fixed a bug in the Texture2D on android where the rendertarget width and height were incorrect.

data.title: Moved DynamicVertex/IndexBuffer into their own source files.
Changes to make use of new Effect files.
Develop - GamePad.GetState()
data.body: Implemented Thumbsticks and Buttons

data.title: GamePad.GetState(int)
data.body: Now handles Thumbsticks + Buttons.
